characters.name: Chiyo Sakura
characters.description:
__Height:__ 145cm (4'9")

The viewpoint character of the series, Sakura is a high school girl with a crush on Nozaki, but when her confession is misinterpreted, she ends up becoming Nozaki's inker assistant. She is in class 2-A and a member of the school's art club. She is petite, and on her head, she wears two large ribbons that have a polka dot pattern, of which it becomes Nozaki's trademark of Chiyo and names a screen tone after her.

characters.name: Umetarou Nozaki
characters.description:
__Height:__ 190 cm (6'3")

Umetarou is the high school student that is the object of Chiyo Sakura's affection. He is secretly a manga artist named Sakiko Yumeno, the creator of the shoujo manga "Let's Love~". This manga is published in the magazine called Monthly Shoujo Romance. Despite making a romance-oriented manga, he has no personal experience in love, and his story ideas are often ridiculous and farfetched. He appreciates Chiyo's drawing ability but is oblivious to her feelings.

In middle school, he was a captain of the school basketball team. In high school, he is now in class 2-B.

characters.name: Mikoto Mikoshiba
characters.description:
__Height:__ 177 cm (5'10")

Mikoto Mikoshiba is one of Nozaki's assistants and Yuu Kashima's best friend and classmate. He has red hair and equally red eyes. Both of his ears appear to be pierced and he usually wears tiny red earrings on them. He attracts the attention of many girls, and is admired by the males as well. However in reality, he has a timid and "tsundere" attitude. While outwardly he flirts with girls shamelessly and confidently, afterwards, he cringes and becomes embarrassed beyond words at his own actions.

characters.name: Yuu Kashima
characters.description:
__Height:__ 176 cm

The prince of the school, even though she is female. She is very popular among the female students and flirts with them. She is part of the drama club and is in class 2-G.

Kashima displays a somewhat princely personality, often flirting with the girls and calling them, "hime" (Japanese for "princess"). She has a firm loyalty towards Hori (whom she calls Hori-chan-senpai), and often seeks his attention. She tries to please Hori, but more often than not, misunderstands the situation and ends up getting things very wrong. For example, she mistook Hori's interest in shoujo manga as a desire to dress and act as a girl, and ended up doing many embarrassing things to Hori such as leaving skirts in his locker.

She has a habit of skipping class and club duties, which finds herself in trouble with her drama club president, Hori, who literally has to go rough on her. She is known to excel in all school subjects and is good in all sports, but is tone deaf. She dislikes pungent food.

characters.name: Masayuki Hori
characters.description:
__Height:__ 164 cm

A third year student and the president of the drama club. He is good in acting and used to appear in plays but stopped due to his short height and now in charge of props. Kashima always causes him trouble but he is often like a doting parent to her. 

Nozaki's Assistant who in charge of the background.

characters.name: Yuzuki Seo
characters.description:
__Height__: 163 cm
__Class__: 2-A

Sakura's classmate. Easily makes people feel offended.
She is a member of the choir club and her singing voice is beautiful enough to be referred to as "Lorelei".

characters.name: Hirotaka Wakamatsu
characters.description:
Freshman who belong to the basketball club and he knows Nozaki since middle school since they were in the same basketball club.

He played against Seo a basketball match and her rough play make him unable to sleep but was able to sleep soundly later thanks to the voice of Lorelei which he doesn't know her true identity.

characters.name: Mitsuya Maeno
characters.description:
**Height:** 176 cm

Previous editor in charge for Nozaki. He is obsessed with tanukis. He likes to attend mixers, drink at parties and read gravure pages.

characters.name: Ken Miyamae
characters.description:
**Height:** 171 cm

Editor in charge for Nozaki. Unfriendly, but Nozaki sees him as cool adult.

Ken's favorite foods are fried fish balls and alcohol, while his least favorite foods are sweet foods. His hobby is reading. His preferred type are sensible, responsible, and, self-reliant women.

characters.name: Yukari Miyako
characters.description:
__Height:__ 164 cm
__Favorite food:__ tomato
__Least favorite food:__ liver
__Hobbies:__ online shopping
__Family:__ mother, father, dog

A college student and a shoujo mangaka and also Nozaki's neighbor who lives upstairs.
Her type is people she can relax around.

characters.name: Tomoda
characters.description:
A character from the game Girls Princess, introduced by Mikoshiba to Nozaki. Tomoda is a supportive character to the protagonist of the game, going as far as to give his youth to the protagonist to assist him.

Due to Tomoda's youth being dedicated to the protagonist of Girls Princess, Nozaki and Mikoshiba became dedicated to write a manga to give Tomoda happiness.

characters.name: Saburou Suzuki
characters.description: The hero of Yumeno Sakiko’s manga “Let’s Love”. A gentleman who excels at everything.

characters.name: Mamiko
characters.description: The heroine of Yumeno Sakiko’s manga “Let’s Love”. Her appearance is inspired by Sakura Chiyo and her personality is based on Mikoshiba Mikoto’s.
